content: Thanks a lot for the in-depth answer. It gave me a really good insight on where I should start my pricing. As I did more research on my initial guess I realized the scalability issues coming with this specific service since every customer is probably seeking for a custom solution. Is this something you consider when evaluating your initial guesses? How do you usually weigh in different factors when deciding to pursue something or not? Niche vs Broad Audience, Recurring Revenue vs One-off purchase, Scalability, etc…
